game.name: Student Station
game.categories: Steam Achievements, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards
game.shortDescription: 편안하고 차분한 공간에서 공부를 정리하고, 진행 상황을 확인하며, 집중력을 유지하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A calm and welcoming space to organize your studies, track your progress, and stay focused.
